title: Buzz Bissinger: "The Mosquito Bowl"
description: This is one of the greatest stories you've never heard. Michael welcomes bestselling author Buzz Bissinger, author of "The Mosquito Bowl: A Game of Life and Death in World War II." Original air date 20 September 2022. The book was published on 13 September 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Buzz Bissinger)
